header.subtitle: Consistently rated as excellent by 255-60r18 drivers
Most popular among drivers in PA
Check out the sale price on this tire

content.body:
### Shop 255/60R18 Tire Size
While not a wildly common tire size, 255/60R18 tires can be found on larger SUVs such as the Nissan Pathfinder, Mazda CX-9, Audi Q7,  Jaguar F-Pace, and Land Rover Range Rover Velar. These larger vehicles need a great set of tires, and might roll out of the factory with a set of Goodyear Eagle Sport All-Season, Continental CrossContact LX Sport, Yokohama Geolandar H/T G056B, or [Kumho Crugen HP71](https://simpletire.com/brands/kumho-tires/crugen-hp71) tires attached.

Popular vehicles
2018-2019 Audi Q7
2017-2020 Jaguar F-Pace
2018-2019 Land Rover Range Rover Velar
2016-2021 Mazda CX-9
2019-2022 Nissan Pathfinder

Most drivers use all-season tires thanks to their ability to perform in dry, wet, and light winter weather conditions. Check out the [Pirelli Scorpion Verde All Season](https://simpletire.com/brands/pirelli-tires/scorpion-verde-all-season), Bridgestone Alenza A/S Ultra, and Falken Ziex CT60 A/S if you need a set of 255/60R18 tires that performs year-round.

Maybe you take your ride off-road from time to time, so you need a tire that performs on any terrain. All-terrain tires are engineered to perform anywhere, so take a look at the Nitto Terra Grappler, Nokian Outpost AT, and [Hankook Dynapro AT2 Xtreme (RF12)](https://simpletire.com/brands/hankook-tires/dynapro-at2-xtreme-rf12) for strong traction on- and off-road

While all-season tires are great year-round, they might struggle in dense ice, slush, and snow. Fortunately, winter tires are designed to give drivers great traction in ice, slush, snow, and lower temperatures. Consider the Continental VikingContact 7, [Yokohama iceGUARD G075](https://simpletire.com/brands/yokohama-tires/iceguard-g075), and Nexen Winguard Sport 2 if you need a set of 255/60R18 tires that provides extra grip in the worst winter weather.

Whether you drive a Jaguar F-Pace, Mazda CX-9, Nissan Pathfinder, or something else, SimpleTire has a set of 255/60R18 tires that meets your needs at a great price!

info.title: Did you know?
info.body: A reliable brand is the #1 ask for most drivers. Here you can shop all the most popular brands and discover new ones – all tested, ranked and rated by our customers.
